verses.verse: And he commanded<WH6680> the steward of his house<WH1004>, saying<WH559>, Fill<WH4390> the men's<WH582> sacks<WH572> with food<WH400>, as much as<WH834> they can<WH3201> carry<WH5375>, and put<WH7760> every man's<WH376> money<WH3701> in his sack's<WH572> mouth<WH6310>. the steward: Heb. him that was over his house

Then Judah<WH3063> came near<WH5066> unto him, and said<WH559>, Oh<WH994> my lord<WH113>, let thy servant<WH5650>, I pray thee, speak<WH1696> a word<WH1697> in my lord's<WH113> ears<WH241>, and let not thine anger<WH639> burn<WH2734> against thy servant<WH5650>: for thou art even as Pharaoh<WH6547>.

And thy servant<WH5650> my father<WH1> said<WH559> unto us, Ye know<WH3045> that my wife<WH802> bare<WH3205> me two<WH8147> sons:

For how<WH349> shall I go up<WH5927> to my father<WH1>, and the lad<WH5288> be not with me? lest peradventure I see<WH7200> the evil<WH7451> that shall come on<WH4672> my father<WH1>. come: Heb. find my father
